title: Obsolete Forms of Media
itunes:title: Obsolete Forms of Media
description:
One challenge with data preservation is that the way we store information changes rapidly. In this episode, we look at some media formats that are now obsolete, including some that Jonathan had never heard about before!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: media, data preservation, analog, wire recorder, Tefifon, Cartrivision, U-matic, Sony, RCA, video, audio, phonautograph, Edison, phonograph, gramophone, turntable, record, cassette
